	If &#147;Other&#148; has been checked in response to the previous question, indicate by check mark which
	financial statement
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:8PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	item the registrant has elected to follow:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:8PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:WINGDINGS">
	&#168;
</FONT>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;Item&nbsp;17&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:WINGDINGS">
	&#168;
</FONT>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;Item&nbsp;18
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:2PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:8PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	If this is an annual report, indicate by check mark whether the
	registrant is a shell company (as defined in
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:8PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	Rule&nbsp;12b-2 of the Exchange Act).
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:8PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:WINGDINGS">
	&#168;
</FONT>
	&nbsp;&nbsp;Yes&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:WINGDINGS">
	&#254;
</FONT>
	&nbsp;
	&nbsp;No
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:2PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:8PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	(APPLICABLE ONLY TO ISSUERS INVOLVED IN BANKRUPTCY PROCEEDINGS DURING THE PAST
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:8PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	FIVE YEARS)
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:8PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	Indicate by check mark
	whether the registrant has filed all documents and reports required to be filed by
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:8PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	Sections&nbsp;12, 13 or 15(d)&nbsp;of the Securities
	Exchange Act of 1934 subsequent to the distribution of securities under a
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:8PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	plan confirmed by a court:
</P>

	&nbsp;&nbsp;Yes&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	FORWARD-LOOKING STATEMENTS AND ASSOCIATED RISKS
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	This annual report on Form 20-F or our &#147;annual report,&#148; contains certain &#147;forward-looking statements&#148; within the meaning
	of Section&nbsp;21E of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended, or the &#147;Exchange Act.&#148; We have based these forward-looking statements largely on our current expectations and projections about future events and financial trends
	affecting the financial condition of our business. Forward-looking statements should not be read as a guarantee or assurance of future performance or results, and will not necessarily be accurate indications of the times at, or by, which such
	performance or results will be achieved. Forward-looking statements are based on information available at the time those statements are made and/or management&#146;s good faith belief as of that time with respect to future events, and are subject to
	risks and uncertainties that could cause actual performance or results to differ materially from those expressed in or suggested by the forward-looking statements. Important factors that could cause such differences include, but are not limited to:
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:6PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>

<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<H5 ALIGN="LEFT">
<A HREF="#D174120D20F_HTM_TOC">
	Table of Contents
</A>
</H5>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	INTRODUCTION AND USE OF CERTAIN TERMS
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	In this annual report, we use the term &#147;Volaris&#148; to refer to Controladora Vuela Compa&ntilde;&iacute;a de Aviaci&oacute;n, S.A.B. de
	C.V., &#147;Volaris Opco&#148; to refer to Concesionaria Vuela Compa&ntilde;&iacute;a de Aviaci&oacute;n, S.A.P.I. de C.V., &#147;Comercializadora&#148; to refer to Comercializadora Volaris, S.A. de C.V., &#147;Servicios Corporativos&#148; to refer
	to Servicios Corporativos Volaris, S.A. de C.V., &#147;Servicios Operativos&#148; to refer to &#147;Servicios Operativos Terrestres Volaris, S.A. de C.V., &#147;Servicios Administrativos&#148; to refer to Servicios Administrativos Volaris, S.A. de
	C.V., &#147;Servicios Earhart&#148; to refer to Servicios Earhart, S.A., &#147;Vuela&#148; to refer to Vuela, S.A. and &#147;Vuela Aviaci&oacute;n&#148; to refer to Vuela Aviaci&oacute;n, S.A. Volaris Opco, Comercializadora, Servicios Corporativos,
	Servicios Operativos. Servicios Administrativos, Vuela and Vuela Aviaci&oacute;n are wholly-owned subsidiaries of Volaris. The terms &#147;we,&#148; &#147;our&#148; and &#147;us&#148; in this annual report refer to Volaris, together with its
	subsidiaries, and to properties and assets that they own or operate, unless otherwise specified. References to &#147;Series A shares&#148; refer to Series A shares of Volaris.
</P>
<EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<A NAME="FIS_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE_3"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:24PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	GLOSSARY OF AIRLINES AND AIRLINE TERMS
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	Set forth below is a glossary of industry terms used in this annual report:
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;Aerocalifornia&#148; means Aerocalifornia, S.A. de C.V.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;Aerom&eacute;xico&#148; means Aerov&iacute;as de M&eacute;xico, S.A. de C.V.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;AirAsia&#148; means AirAsia Berhad.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;Airbus&#148; means Airbus S.A.S.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;Aladia&#148; means Aladia Airlines, S.A. de C.V.
</P>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;Alaska Air&#148; means Alaska Air Group, Inc.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;Allegiant&#148; means Allegiant Travel Company.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;Alma&#148; means Aerol&iacute;neas Mesoamericanas, S.A. de C.V.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;Aerom&eacute;xico Connect&#148; means Aerolitoral, S.A. de C.V.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;American&#148; means American Airlines Group.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;Available seat miles&#148; or &#147;ASMs&#148; means the number of seats available for passengers multiplied by the number of miles the
	seats are flown.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;Average daily aircraft utilization&#148; means flight hours or block hours, as applicable, divided by number
	of&nbsp;days in the period divided by average aircraft in the period.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;Average economic fuel cost per gallon&#148; means total fuel
	expense divided by the total number of fuel gallons consumed.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;Average ticket revenue per booked passenger&#148; means total
	passenger revenue divided by booked passengers.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;Average stage length&#148; means the average number of miles flown per passenger
	flight segment.
</P>
<EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<A NAME="FIS_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE_4"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;Aviacsa&#148; means Consorcio Aviaxsa, S.A. de C.V.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;Avianca&#148; means Avianca Holding S.A.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;Avolar&#148; means Avolar Aerol&iacute;neas, S.A. de C.V.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;Azteca&#148; means L&iacute;neas A&eacute;reas Azteca, S.A. de C.V.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;Azul&#148; means Azul Linhas A&eacute;reas Brasileiras S.A.
</P>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	v
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage7"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<H5 ALIGN="LEFT">
<A HREF="#D174120D20F_HTM_TOC">
	Table of Contents
</A>
</H5>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;Block hours&#148; means the number of hours during which the aircraft is in revenue
	service, measured from the time it leaves the gate until the time it arrives to the gate at destination.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;Booked passengers&#148;
	means the total number of passengers booked on all flight segments.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;CASM&#148; or &#147;unit costs&#148; means total operating
	expenses, net divided by ASMs.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;CASM ex fuel&#148; means total operating expenses, net excluding fuel expense divided by ASMs.
</P>
<EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<A NAME="FIS_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE_5"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;CBP&#148; means United States Customs and Border Protection.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;CEO&#148; means current engine option.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;Copa&#148; means Copa Holding S.A.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;Delta&#148; means Delta Air Lines, Inc.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;DGAC&#148; means the Mexican Civil Aeronautic Authority (
<I>
	Direcci&oacute;n General de Aeron&aacute;utica Civil
</I>
	).
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;DOT&#148; means the United States Department of Transportation.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;EPA&#148; means the United States Environmental Protection Agency.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;FAA&#148; means the United States Federal Aviation Administration.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;FCC&#148; means the United States Federal Communications Commission.
</P>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;Flight hours&#148; means the number of hours during which the aircraft is in revenue service, measured from the time it takes off until
	the time it lands at the destination.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;Frontier&#148; means Frontier Airlines, Inc.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;Gol&#148; means Linhas A&eacute;reas Inteligentes, S.A.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;Grupo Aerom&eacute;xico&#148; means Grupo Aerom&eacute;xico, S.A.B. de C.V., which includes Aerom&eacute;xico and Aerom&eacute;xico
	Connect.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;Grupo Mexicana&#148; means Grupo Mexicana de Aviaci&oacute;n, S.A. de C.V., which is the holding company for three
	airlines, Compa&ntilde;&iacute;a Mexicana de Aviaci&oacute;n, Mexicana Click and Mexicana Link.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;Grupo TACA&#148; means Taca
	International Airlines, S.A.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;IATA&#148; means the International Air Transport Association.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;Interjet&#148; means ABC Aerol&iacute;neas, S.A. de C.V.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;LATAM&#148; means LATAM Airlines Group S.A.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;Latin America&#148; means, collectively, Mexico, the Caribbean, Central America and South America.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;Latin American publicly traded airline carriers&#148; means, collectively, Aerom&eacute;xico, Avianca, Copa, Gol and LATAM.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;Legacy carrier&#148; means an airline that typically offers scheduled flights to major domestic and international routes (directly or
	through membership in an alliance) and serves numerous smaller cities, operates mainly through a &#147;hub-and-spoke&#148; network route system and has higher cost structures than low-cost carriers due to higher labor costs, flight crew and aircraft
	scheduling inefficiencies, concentration of operations in higher cost airports and multiple classes of services.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	vi
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage8"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<H5 ALIGN="LEFT">
<A HREF="#D174120D20F_HTM_TOC">
	Table of Contents
</A>
</H5>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;Load factor&#148; means RPMs divided by ASMs and expressed as a percentage.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;Low-cost carrier&#148; means an airline that typically flies direct, point-to-point flights, often serves major markets through
	secondary, lower cost airports in the same regions as major population centers, provides a single class of service, thereby increasing the number of seats on each flight and avoiding the significant and incremental cost of offering premium-class
	services, and tends to operate fleets with only one or two aircraft families, in order to maximize the utilization of flight crews across the fleet, improve aircraft scheduling efficiency and flexibility and minimize inventory and aircraft
	maintenance costs.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;NEO&#148; means new engine option.
</P>
<EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<A NAME="FIS_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE_6"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;Nova Air&#148; means Polar Airlines de Mexico, S.A. de C.V.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;On-time&#148; means flights arriving within 15 minutes of the scheduled arrival time.
</P>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;Other Latin American publicly traded airlines&#148; means, collectively, Avianca, Copa, Gol, Grupo Aerom&eacute;xico and LATAM.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;Passenger flight segments&#148; means the total number of passengers flown on all flight segments.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;RASM&#148; means passenger revenue divided by ASMs.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;Revenue passenger miles&#148; or &#147;RPMs&#148; means the number of miles flown by passengers.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;Ryanair&#148; means Ryanair Holdings plc.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<I>
</I>
	&#147;SCT&#148; means the Mexican Communications and Transportation Ministry (
<I>
	Secretar&iacute;a de Comunicaciones y
	Transportes
</I>
	).
<I>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;Southwest Airlines&#148; means Southwest Airlines Co.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;Spirit&#148; means Spirit Airlines, Inc.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;Tiger&#148; means Tiger Airways Holdings Limited.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;Total operating revenue per ASM,&#148; or &#147;TRASM&#148; means total revenue divided by ASMs.
</P>
<EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<A NAME="FIS_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE_7"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;TSA&#148; means the United States Transportation Security Administration.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;Trip&#148; means TRIP Linhas A&eacute;reas S.A.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;ULCC&#148; or &#147;ultra-low-cost carrier&#148; means an airline that belongs to a subset of low-cost carriers, which distinguishes
	itself by using a business model with an intense focus on low-cost, efficient asset utilization, unbundled revenue sources aside from the base fares with multiple products and services offered for additional fees. In the United States, Spirit
	Airlines, Inc. and Allegiant define themselves as ULCCs and Volaris and VivaAerobus follow the ULCC model in Mexico.
</P>
</EFX_UNIDENTIFIED_TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;United&#148;
	means United Continental Holdings, Inc.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;U.S.-based publicly traded target market competitors&#148; means Alaska Air, American,
	Delta and United.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;VFR&#148; means passengers who are visiting friends and relatives.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;VivaAerobus&#148; means Aeroenlaces Nacionales, S.A. de C.V.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;Webjet&#148; means Linhas A&eacute;reas Econ&ocirc;micas.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	&#147;Wizz&#148; means Wizz Air Holdings Plc.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	vii
</P>

<A HREF="#D174120D20F_HTM_TOC">
	Table of Contents
</A>
</H5>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
<B>
	PRESENTATION OF FINANCIAL INFORMATION AND OTHER INFORMATION
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	This annual report includes our audited consolidated financial statements at December&nbsp;31, 2014 and 2015 for each of the three years in
	the period ended December&nbsp;31, 2015, which have been prepared in accordance with International Financial Reporting Standards, as issued by the International Accounting Standards Board (IASB), referred hereinafter as IFRS.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<I>
</I>
	Unless otherwise specified, all references to &#147;U.S. dollars,&#148; &#147;dollars,&#148; &#147;U.S. $&#148; or &#147;$&#148; are to
	United States dollars, the legal currency of the United States, and references to &#147;pesos&#148; or &#147;Ps.&#148; are to Mexican Pesos, the legal currency of Mexico. Except as otherwise indicated, peso amounts have been converted to U.S.
	dollars at the exchange rate of Ps.17.2065 per U.S. $1.00, as reported by the Mexican Central Bank (
<I>
	Banco de M&eacute;xico
</I>
	) as the rate for the payment of obligations denominated in foreign currency payable in Mexico (
<I>
	tipo de cambio para
	solventar obligaciones denominadas en moneda extranjera, pagaderas en M&eacute;xico
</I>
	) in effect on December&nbsp;31, 2015. Such conversions are for the convenience of the reader and should not be construed as representations that the peso amounts
	actually represent such U.S. dollar amounts or could be converted into U.S. dollars at the rate indicated, or at all. For more information on exchange rates, see Item&nbsp;3: &#147;Key Information&#151;Exchange Rates.&#148; Amounts presented in this
	annual report may not add up due to rounding.
<I>
</I>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:18PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<B>
	Industry and Market Data
</B>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
<I>
</I>
	We obtained the industry and market data used in this annual report from research, surveys or studies conducted by third parties on our
	behalf, information contained in third-party publications, such as the Mexican Institute of Statistics and Geography (
<I>
	Instituto Nacional de Estad&iacute;stica y Geograf&iacute;a
</I>
	), or INEGI, reports from the Mexican Civil Aeronautic Authority
	(
<I>
	Direcci&oacute;n General de Aeron&aacute;utica Civil
</I>
	), or the DGAC, reports from the Mexican Central Bank and other publicly available sources. Third-party publications generally state that they have obtained information from sources
	believed to be reliable, but do not guarantee the accuracy and completeness of such information. Although we believe that this data and information is reliable, we have not independently verified it. Additionally, certain market share data is based
	on published information available for the Mexican states. There is no comparable data available relating to the particular cities we serve. In presenting market share estimates for these cities, we have estimated the size of the market on the basis
	of the published information for the state in which the particular city is located. We believe this method is reasonable, but the results have not been verified by any independent source.
<I>
</I>
</P>

	&nbsp;

	SELECTED CONSOLIDATED FINANCIAL INFORMATION AND
	OPERATING DATA

<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	The following tables summarize selected financial and operating data for our business for the periods presented. You
	should read this selected consolidated financial data in conjunction with &#147;Management&#146;s Discussion and Analysis of Financial Condition and Results of Operations&#148; and our audited consolidated financial statements, including the related
	notes thereto, all included elsewhere in this annual report. We prepare our consolidated financial statements in accordance with IFRS.
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:12PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	We
	derived the selected consolidated statements of operations data for the years ended December&nbsp;31, 2013, 2014 and 2015 and the selected consolidated statements of financial position data as of December&nbsp;31, 2014 and 2015 from our audited
	financial statements included in this annual report. The selected consolidated statements of operations data for the years ended December&nbsp;31, 2012 and 2011 and the selected consolidated statements of financial position data as of
	December&nbsp;31, 2013, 2012, and 2011 were derived from the audited financial statements for those periods. See Item&nbsp;18: &#147;Financial Statements.&#148; Our historical results are not necessarily indicative of the results to be expected in
	the future.
</P>

<A NAME="FIS_INCOME_STATEMENT"></A>
<TABLE CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0" WIDTH="100%" BORDER="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" ALIGN="CENTER">

<TD VALIGN="BOTTOM" COLSPAN="22" ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="BORDER-BOTTOM:1.00PT SOLID #000000">
<B>
	For the Years ended December&nbsp;31,

<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(1)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	Peso amounts were converted to U.S. dollars solely for the convenience of the reader at the rate of Ps.17.2065 per U.S. $1.00 as the rate for the payment of obligations denominated in foreign currency payable in Mexico
	in effect on December&nbsp;31, 2015. Such conversions should not be construed as a representation that the peso amounts actually represent such U.S. dollar amounts or could be converted into U.S. dollars at the rate indicated, or at all.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(2)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	Includes routine and ordinary maintenance expenses only. See Item&nbsp;5: &#147;Operating and Financial Review and Prospects&#151;Operating Results.&#148;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(3)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	Includes, among other things, major maintenance expenses, which are capitalized and subsequently amortized. See Item&nbsp;5: &#147;Operating and Financial Review and Prospects&#151;Operating Results.&#148;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(4)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	Unvested shares awarded under the management incentive plan and our swap shares were deemed treasury shares and non-dilutive until December&nbsp;31, 2012, and accordingly, they were excluded in the determination of
	weighted average diluted shares outstanding and disregarded in the calculation of basic and diluted earnings per share to such date. During 2013, issued shares awarded under the management incentive plan and, up until April&nbsp;22, 2013, our swap
	shares are deemed treasury shares and entitled the awardees to participate in dividends prior to vesting; accordingly, they have been included in the determination of weighted average shares outstanding for calculating basic and diluted earnings per
	share for the period. The shares awarded under the share purchase plan are deemed to be treasury shares from November&nbsp;6, 2014, date in which these shares were acquired by the administrative Trust number F/745291, and entitled the awardees to
	participate in dividends from that date. Accordingly, these shares have been included in the determination of weighted average shares outstanding for calculating basic and diluted earnings per share. See Item&nbsp;5: &#147;Operating and Financial
	Review and Prospects&#151;Critical Accounting Policies and Estimates&#151;Long-term Incentive Plans&#151;Management Incentive Plan.&#148;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(5)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	Basic and diluted earnings per share amounts are calculated by dividing the income for the year attributable to ordinary equity holders of the parent by the weighted average number of ordinary shares and unvested shares
	awarded under the management incentive and share purchase plans outstanding during the year, this is because the shares are entitled to a dividend if and when one is declared by the Company.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(6)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	The basis used for the computation of the information is to multiply the earnings per basic and diluted share obtained pursuant to footnote (5)&nbsp;above by ten, which is the number of CPOs represented by each ADS.
	Each CPO, in turn, represents a financial interest in one Series A share of common stock of Volaris.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(7)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	EBITDA, Adjusted EBITDA and Adjusted EBITDAR are included as supplemental disclosures because we believe they are useful indicators of our operating performance. Derivations of EBITDA, Adjusted EBITDA and Adjusted
	EBITDAR are well recognized performance measurements in the airline industry that are frequently used by investors, securities analysts and other interested parties in comparing the operating performance of companies in our industry. However,
	because derivations of EBITDA, Adjusted EBITDA and Adjusted EBITDAR are not determined in accordance with IFRS, such measures are susceptible to varying calculations and not all companies calculate the measures in the same manner. As a result,
	derivations of EBITDA, Adjusted EBITDA and Adjusted EBITDAR as presented may not be directly comparable to similarly titled measures presented by other companies.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(8)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	See &#147;Glossary of Airlines and Airline Terms&#148; elsewhere in this annual report for definitions of terms used in this table.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(9)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	Includes scheduled and charter.
</TD>
</TR>

<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
	(1)
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
	Peso amounts were converted to U.S. dollars solely for the convenience of the reader at the rate of Ps.17.2065 per U.S.$1.00 as the rate for the payment of obligations denominated in foreign currency payable in Mexico
	in effect on December&nbsp;31, 2015. Such conversions should not be construed as a representation that the peso amounts actually represent such U.S. dollar amounts or could be converted into U.S. dollars at the rate indicated, or at all.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT ; FONT-SIZE:8PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:0PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN" ALIGN="CENTER">
	3
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage13"></A>
<P STYLE='PAGE-BREAK-BEFORE:ALWAYS'>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
<H5 ALIGN="LEFT">
<A HREF="#D174120D20F_HTM_TOC">
	Table of Contents
</A>
</H5>
<TABLE STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN; FONT-SIZE:10PT" BORDER="0" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" WIDTH="100%">
<TR>
<TD WIDTH="4%" VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT">
<B>
<A NAME="D174120D20F_HTM_ROM174120_6">
</A>
	B.
</B>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<B>
	Exchange Rates
</B>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<P STYLE="MARGIN-TOP:6PT; MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT; TEXT-INDENT:4%; FONT-SIZE:10PT; FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN">
	The following table sets forth, for the periods indicated, the high, low
	period-end and average buying rates, express in Mexican Pesos per U.S. dollar, in each case for the purchase of U.S. dollars, all expressed in nominal pesos per U.S. dollar. We make no representation that the peso amounts referred to in this annual
	report could have been or could be converted into U.S. dollars at any particular rate or at all.
</P>
<P STYLE="FONT-SIZE:12PT;MARGIN-TOP:0PT;MARGIN-BOTTOM:0PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>

	(2)
</TD>
